name: insurance-system
description: Insurance Management System with Angular Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test
